page.title: 16An interview with Mr Farrar
page.content: I interviewed my dad because he is a lorry driver and soon lorry driving will have changed.There might not even be lorry drivers in ten years because lorrys may be remote control by then. The weight of his lorry is 15.5tons when it is fully loaded. His present lorrys registration number is VBC 596X. My dad was 28 when he started lorry driving so he has been a lorry driver for 10 years.They do quite a few local calls a day and usually they do 10. His lorry is comfortable when it is moving but sometimes he gets lonely in his cab. At night they park the lorrys in the warehouse. He said that he doesn't know if he will be a lorry driver until he is 65. BY ALISON FARRAR. AGE 10 years.
